attributes.action: Make men who are members of the masons/stonemasons secret society declare themselves members if they are in public life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has not forced bankers with huge bonuses to return this money even though the tax payers have had to bail out the banks. Why is this?  Is it because there is an old boys network working in the background.  All membership of any secret societies should be declared by law as there is a conflict of interest between loyalty to the brotherhood and transparent democracy.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
